welcome_benefits: Shoppers Stop Voucher Worth ₹500 and Complimentary Shoppers Stop Silver Edge Membership

Rewards Rate: 3% Reward Points on Every Shoppers Stop Spend and 1 % Reward Points on Non-Shoppers Stop Spends
Reward Redemption: Reward Points Can Be Redeemed Against Multiple Options

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: Cardholders get a 1% fuel surcharge waived (up to Rs. 250 per statement cycle), across all petrol stations in India.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5 % of the transaction amount subject to a minimum charge of Rs 500.

product_details: Complimentary Shoppers Stop Silver Edge Membership.
Get a Shoppers Stop Voucher worth ₹500 as a welcome benefit redeemable on any bill value.
1% fuel surcharge waiver across all fuel stations (up to ₹250 per statement cycle)
